DOC.brief_summary: Comparing nifedipine placebo maintenance tocolysis preterm labor
DOC.brief_title: Nifedipine v Placebo Maintenance Tocolysis Preterm Labor .
DOC.detailed_description: To estimate whether maintenance nifedipine tocolysis arrest preterm labor prolongs pregnancy improve neonatal outcome .
DOC.criteria: arrest preterm labor rupture membrane , fetal distress , placenta previa , placental abruption , maternal medical contraindication tocolysis
